name: Winding stairway
text: You are in a winding stairway. Where does it end? Does it?

name: Empty street
text: You stand between two rows of shops. One row sells things you don't need, the other things you don't want.

name: Wooded bridge
text: You find yourself at the enterance to a bridge to no where.

name: Steel jungle
text: Twists of steel, broken dreams, and you.

name: Stairway to the sky
text: Before you is a stairway to the sky, leading deeper into the darkeness.

name: Spider's web
text: You stop just short of forever entangling yourself in a spiders web.

name: Bridge of seas
text: The legends are true. You can dance across the seas to music of the devil.

name: Mountain of heaven
text: The heavens open and reveal a mountain of beauty and expanse.

name: Electric village
text: No one lives here anymore, not even you.

name: Empty amusement
text: There is no joy here. Only decay. And even that, is falling apart.

name: Temple of the cold
text: All hail the ice. Long live the frost. Glory to the frozen death that awaits us all.

name: Sea of woe
text: It is said that the tears of a thousand widows made this sea. Odd that it is so small.

name: Headstone of hate
text: Here is buried the sourge of seven generations. The butcher of peace. The master of despair. (Or his killer.)

name: Endless waterfall
text: Water rushes around you on all side. Surely this basin won't be filled today?

name: Underground maze
text: You find yourself lost in a maze of layers and mysteries.

name: Beach of despair
text: Here your dreams crash against the rocks.

name: Abandonded mansion
text: Such beauty, such wealth! Such waste.

name: Temple of man
text: What kind of god builds a temple to himself?

name: Fortress of Virtue
text: The last bastion of the civilized order fell long ago to mutiny.

name: Chapel of Old
text: You stand before an ancient chapel. You don't dare ask the monks who they pray to. Nor they you what you're praying for.

name: Old woods
text: These are not the first woods you've been lost in. They are likely the last.

name: Castle Nigh
text: Doors welcome, gates warn, castles threaten.

name: The hall of forgetten victories
text: This celebrates the deaths of those who died preserving a way of life long forgotten.
